name: Monolith Burger
description:
Created for the Godot Wild Jam #53 by Adam Whitford and Jason Zakhar. We used Godot 4, beta 12. Due to this, and me not know what I'm doing you might be unable to run this. I apologize in advance!

This game was inspired by the Monolith Burger minigame within Space Quest. Enjoy!

NOTE: If you encounter an error I suggest using Chrome/Edge. I could not get this to load on safari/iOS. SharedArrayBuffer is enabled. In retrospect, using Godot 4 beta may have been a poor choice.
